attributes.action: insist that Royal Mail scraps the options First and Second class mail and replaces them with "Priority" and "Standard"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is for the Prime Minister to insist that Royal Mail's scraps its First and Second Class post options and replaces them with the options "Priority" and "Standard." The old label of "First" and "Second Class" is anachronistic and has class connotations, which surely the Government would not want to preserve.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Royal Mail.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
